name: CPMC Mission Bernal Campus
description: Mission Bernal Campus & Orthopedic Institute offers comprehensive medical services, including: - 24-hour emergency care. The Emergency Department entrance is located on 27th Street. - Acute Care for the Elderly (ACE) Unit. A geriatric ED. - Mission Bernal Women's Clinic for pregnancy and gynecologic care. - Orthopedic care, including total joint replacement. Opened in 2019, the Mission Bernal Hospital is a clean, green and seismic-safe building. https://www.sutterhealth.org/find-location/facilit
